definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: LiuMeng ordered, within three days LinZhenHai head take necessary.
sentences.chinese: 刘猛下令，三天之内必需取下林振海的首级。

sentences.english: On Terephon, Luke beheaded her after a struggle.
sentences.chinese: 卢克在泰雷丰与卢米娅交手，斩下了她的首级。

sentences.english: When the messenger arrived, he told Jehu, 'They have brought the heads of the princes.'
sentences.chinese: 有使者来告诉耶户说，他们将王众子的首级送来了。

sentences.english: He is represented as a headless body holding its decapitated head in its hands.
sentences.chinese: 人们把他描绘成手持自己首级的无头之躯。

sentences.english: And there came a messenger, and told him, saying, They have brought the heads of the king's sons.
sentences.chinese: 有使者来告诉耶户说，他们将王众子的首级送来了。

sentences.english: And the woman said unto Joab, Behold, his head shall be thrown to thee over the wall.
sentences.chinese: 妇人对约押说，那人的首级必从城墙上丢给你。

sentences.english: And he said, Put them in two heaps at the entrance of the gate until the morning.
sentences.chinese: 耶户说，将首级在城门口堆作两堆，搁到早晨。

sentences.english: Then Jehu ordered, 'Put them in two piles at the entrance of the city gate until morning.'
sentences.chinese: 耶户说，将首级在城门口堆作两堆，搁到明日。

sentences.english: A minute later the head of John was handed to the frightened Salome .
sentences.chinese: 不大会儿，约翰的首级就交给了魂飞魄散的莎乐美。

sentences.english: And they cut off the head of Sheba the son of Bichri, and cast it out to Joab.
sentences.chinese: 他们便割下比基利的儿子示巴的首级，丢给约押。

sentences.english: He was driven back to pao an with a price on his head .
sentences.chinese: 在悬赏缉拿他的首级的情况下他被迫退到保安去。

sentences.english: The briber described the tribe head's bribery.
sentences.chinese: 贿赂者描写了部降首级的纳贿行动。

sentences.english: ' Then Jehu ordered, 'Put them in two piles at the entrance of the city gate until morning.
sentences.chinese: 耶户说，将首级在城门口堆作两堆，搁到明日。

definition: to behead sb and display the head in public
to report a heroic deed/to mention sb in dispatches
to request recognition for sb's merits/to recommend sb for promotion or an award
person/number of people/(per) capita/(a person's) head/(Tw) person whose identity is used by sb else (e.g. to create a bogus account)
